mapper.insert: insert into in003t ( quote_no, prod_code, amt_ins, opayment, polholder, insurant_a, insurant_b, premium, insdate, ins_from, ins_to, ptype, insloc, mobile, email, poption, v_bank_name, v_bank_no, v_bank_due_date, pbohumja_mobile, jumin, owner, pbohumja_birth, advisor_no, already_group_ins ) values ( #{quote_no}, #{prod_code}, #{amt_ins}, #{opayment}, #{polholder}, #{insurant_a}, #{insurant_b}, #{premium}, #{insdate}, #{ins_from}, #{ins_to}, #{ptype}, #{insloc}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{poption}, #{v_bank_name}, #{v_bank_no}, #{v_bank_due_date}, #{pbohumja_mobile}, #{jumin}, #{owner}, #{pbohumja_birth}, #{advisor_no}, #{already_group_ins} )
